data.taskTitle: add collapsable project notes section to each project
add collapsable project notes section to each project
data.approach: Create a collapsible ProjectNotes component with Monaco editor that appears in the tasks page sidebar for each project. Will store notes per-project in projects.json file under a notes field. Component will match the existing Active Tasks/Paused/Open Tasks collapsible pattern with copy and clear buttons.
